text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki astounds and enraptures the<n>audience
at the Yasuda Kinen, and her<n>fans' expectations
for her continue to<n>swell. Yet, I can't help but feel
that<n>something was off about her<n>performance.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
My unease grows stronger, and I rush to<n>find her.
Unfortunately, a worried Hishi<n>Amazon informs
me that Fuji Kiseki has<n>left without me.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Our next race is the autumn Tenno Sho.<n>But first, I
need to find out what's wrong<n>with Fuji Kiseki.
